summary: This is an email chain scheduling a WebEx meeting titled 'Epstein Trust Discussion' for July 6, 2020, among multiple recipients from the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS). It indicates an internal discussion about the Epstein Trust, likely related to financial or asset management following Jeffrey Epstein's death.

events.title: Epstein Trust Discussion Meeting
events.description: A scheduled WebEx meeting among US Attorney's Office (SDNY) personnel to discuss the Epstein Trust.

keyFacts: An internal meeting titled 'Epstein Trust Discussion' was scheduled for July 6, 2020, among personnel from the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS).
The meeting was conducted via WebEx, indicating it was a virtual discussion, possibly related to the management or investigation of assets from Jeffrey Epstein's estate.
The document shows ongoing official interest and coordination regarding Epstein's financial affairs nearly a year after his death in August 2019.
